list.name: customer
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "customer" WHERE "customer" <> 'you'

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "postgresql" WITH KEY = "host" where customer='$customer'

list.label: DB name
list.name: database_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pg_stat_cache" WITH KEY = "dbname" where customer='$customer' and host='$host'
